# Resume
Describe briefly the idea. Use 1 paragraph and less than 100 words, if possible.

# Subject
Please, describe things like:
- the context
- the subject
- a suggestion
- the problem
- what currently happens / what should happen
- features from other packages / libraries / crates
- other ideas
